item.description:
Hi Journeyers to wholeness,

Did you know you could turn a persistent self-judgment into an icing on a cake?
Come and celebrate you! We are repeating the topic of our last meetup and giving you some new tools!

Have you ever felt they you could be living from a place of authentic self but something "is holding you back"?
If you have time to join us this Sunday I have a yummy surprise for you. During the meetup I am going to continue teaching a brand new, extremely powerful and effortless technique I have just came up with. It allows you to extract all the wonderful, colorful and multifaceted parts of you lost to old and persistent self-judgment or anger, or past trauma.

All of us are faced with physical and emotional challenges on our life path, some more then others.
We all want to overcome blocks, once and for all
And be healthier, happier and more fulfilled.
But many of you who are coming to this meetup have arrived just at the point when they thought all hope was lost, not sure any longer you could "pull it off."
To learn that hope is within your reach, even in supposedly untreatable cases, make sure to read http://www.wholistich...

However there is a tool, EDR â€“ Energetic Displacement reintegration, so powerful, so transformational, so life-altering, that everything changes. You can be living your will again with all the passion of the authentic re-integrated YOU.

We will be learning new energy psychology techniques, energy movement exercises and other practical tool to reverse your energy loss to trauma and fear anywhere and anytime daily.

This is a SUPER valuable stuff, and as always we have great time learning it.
So sign up early and Join us this Sunday for more powerful skills and techniques needed on your journey to freedom.

------------------------

group.name: Freedom from Fear/ Anxiety /Emotional Trauma Group

item.name: An Icing On the cake - Celebrate You!
